metadata.description: The invasion continues! First defeated by a tiny Earth microbe, the alien invaders have adapted and their total conquest of planet Earth is well under way. In this action-packed graphic novel, the alien invasion has descended upon Kansas City with all new terrifying weapons, but the government and the military are gone and left the city undefended, how does Kansas City stand a chance? Meanwhile, hundreds of miles away in a small plains town called Haven, an outpost of humanity just might have been given a second chance at survival until the war strikes home. Based on concepts and stories originated by H.G. Wells!
metadata.name: War of the Worlds
